definition: citric acid cycle/Krebs cycle/tricarboxylic acid cycle

sentences.english: Lemons contain pectin fiber, which assists in fighting hunger cravings.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬富含果膠纖維，它又可以抵抗飢餓。

sentences.english: We also bought a lemon tree and a tangerine tree.
sentences.chinese: 還買了一樹檸檬，和濟州蜜橘。
大明蝦｜盤煎，香蒜，百里香，檸檬。

sentences.english: I usually add some lemon juice on fried fish.
sentences.chinese: 我通常在煎魚上加檸檬汁。

sentences.english: The leach aiding effect and action mechanism of leach aid agent citric acid are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了助浸劑檸檬酸的助浸效果及其作用機理。

sentences.english: If you're affluent, you can also put a lemon slice after discharge into the pot boil .
sentences.chinese: 如果你富裕，你也可以把鍋後，煮到放電的檸檬片。

sentences.english: Aunt Petunia looked as though she'd just swallowed a lemon.
sentences.chinese: 帕特尼亞看起來像剛剛嚥下了一個檸檬。
加入擦成細絲的檸檬皮。

sentences.english: Can drink lemon tea before and after exercise.
sentences.chinese: 可以飲用檸檬茶，練習前後。

sentences.english: Intense, coconut and vanilla, with a hint of sultana, lemon and peat.
sentences.chinese: 激烈，椰子和香草，並暗示蘇丹娜，檸檬和泥炭。

sentences.english: Can you squeeze any more juice from the lemon?
sentences.chinese: 你還能從那個檸檬榨出汁嗎？

sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食鹽，檸檬汁，孜然粉，橄欖油和胡椒粉調味。

sentences.english: SOUR】Some people don't like lemon juice, it tastes sour.
sentences.chinese: 有些人不喜歡檸檬汁，因爲它是酸的。

sentences.english: It produces round, light orange-colored fruits about the size of lemons.
sentences.chinese: 它的果實是圓形的，淡橙黃色，和檸檬一般大小。

sentences.english: This paper reviewed the research progress in synthesis of citral in the recent years.
sentences.chinese: 文章綜述了近年來檸檬醛的合成研究進展。

sentences.english: The cool drink was garnished with a slice of lemon.
sentences.chinese: 譯這種冷飲用了一片檸檬作裝飾。
